title: Pedagogical Reconfiguration to Enhance Effectiveness of Remote Design Studio Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Requires content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments and a formative assessment-centered feedback system.

learning_goals: Learners can explain specific methods for conducting design critiques in remote settings and apply them to real-world projects
Learners can design a process for visualizing and sharing collaborative design ideas using only mobile devices
Learners can analyze differences in learning effectiveness between physical and remote studios and propose improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
